reviews.text: Platinum Pools And Outdoor Living 318 E Northwest Hwy, Grapevine, TX 76051

"Great communication and even better service." "This company was fantastic for our backyard remodel!" "And Daniel, his main masonry guy does fantastic work!"

Adrian and his team built us the pool of our dreams. Beautiful and unique pool with shiny elevated spa, plenty of free swimming length and nice tanning ledges. We appreciated working with the team, Adrian always gave us a heads up in … More Response from the owner 8 months ago Thank you for the kind words Robert. I’m so happy to hear you are enjoying your new backyard!!! I’ll see you soon to touch up that turf!!!! Thanks again!

I have Been involved in over 30 projects with Platinum Pools And look forward to many more. By far the best value and quality pool builder in DFW! Adrian, the owner always delivers on every project we have done together. His attention to detail and quality is superb. Highly recommend. More

This company was fantastic for our backyard remodel! The owner of the company, Adrian, used his expertise to help us come up with a plan to update our dated backyard and pool. He didn’t try to upsell us on things that we were not looking to … More Response from the owner 2 months ago Thank you for the kind words. If there are ever any questions or issues at all please do not hesitate to reach out.
